texts.name: Crow Tengu (Manga)
texts.desc:
If this card is Special Summoned from your Graveyard: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

(This card is a Yokai-Type monster)
(This card is always treated as a "Sky" card.)

texts.name: Onmoraki (Manga)
texts.desc:
If this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard: Draw 1 card.

(This card is a Yokai-Type monster)

texts.name: Flame Wall
texts.desc: If there is a Pyro-Type monster in your Graveyard, you take no damage from your opponent's card effects.

texts.name: Rank-Down-Magic Utopia Fall
texts.desc: When a "Number" Xyz Monster you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Target that monster in the Graveyard; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster with a lower Rank than that monster in the Graveyard, by using it as the Xyz Material. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon.)

texts.name: Level Pod
texts.desc: FLIP: Return all monsters on the field to the Decks. Then, each player must draw cards equal to the combined Levels of their returned monsters, and reveal those cards. If a player doesn't draw 1 of their returned monsters, they must discard all cards they drew.

texts.name: Recycling Plant
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Machine-Type Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing monsters from your side of the field or Graveyard as Fusion Materials, and if you do, it can attack this turn, ignoring the Battle City or Virtual World Rules.

texts.name: Sinister Justice
texts.desc: Level 4 or lower Fusion Monsters can attack during the turn they are Fusion Summoned, ignoring the Battle City or Virtual World Rules. If a Level 4 or lower Fusion Monster inflicts battle damage: Gain 800 LP.

texts.name: Desperate Battle
texts.desc: During your Battle Phase: Target 1 face-up monster you control; It loses 1000 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase, and can attack twice during this turn.

texts.name: Number C102: Archfiend Seraph (Anime)
texts.desc:
4 Level 5 LIGHT monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 102: Star Seraph Sentry", it gains these effects.
● You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate the effects of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and if you do, its ATK becomes 0.
● When this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect (Quick Effect): You can detach all Xyz Material from this card; this card cannot be destroyed by that battle or effect and inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK.

texts.name: Soul Rope (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster(s) you control is destroyed: Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck.

texts.name: Number S39: Utopia Prime (Manga)
texts.desc:
3 Level 4 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Number 39: Utopia" you control as the Xyz Material. (Transfer its Xyz Materials to this card.) Once per turn: You can detach all Xyz Materials from this card and reduce your LP to 1; banish all monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the combined ATK of the banished monsters.

texts.name: Armored Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc: (This card is always treated as an "Armed Dragon" card.)

texts.name: Eradicating Aerosol (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 Insect monster on the field; destroy that target.

texts.name: Champion's Storm
texts.desc: Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. Also, your opponent takes the same amount of damage you take this turn.

texts.name: Fool's Dice
texts.desc: When a monster your opponent controls leaves the field: Discard 1 Level 2 or lower Normal Monster; Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Level of the monster that left the field x 200.

texts.name: Quick Attack
texts.desc: 1 Fusion Monster you control can attack the turn it is Fusion Summoned, ignoring the Battle City or Virtual World Rules.
texts.str1: Can attack, ignoring the Battle City or Virtual World Rules

texts.name: Master Spirit Tech Force - Pendulum Ruler
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During your Main Phase: You can return this card to the Extra Deck.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
"Spirit Tech Force - Pendulum Governor" 1 "Spirit" monster
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. Monsters your opponent controls with a Level lower than or equal to this card's, and monsters your opponent controls other than Pendulum Monsters, cannot attack, also their effects are negated. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Spirit Gem" monster that was Pendulum Summoned from the hand and whose monster effect was not used; Tribute that monster, and if you do, you can use the targeted monster's effect up to twice, also double any effect damage inflicted by this effect. Once per turn: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

texts.name: Rank-Down-Magic Numeron Fall (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 "Number" Xyz Monster you control; Xyz Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster with a lower Rank than that monster you control, by using it as the Xyz Material. (Transfer its Xyz Materials to the Summoned monster.)

texts.name: Chiron the Mage (Anime)
texts.desc: At the start of the Battle Phase: You can declare 1 card name, then target 1 Set card your opponent controls; reveal the Set card, and if it was the declared card, destroy it.

texts.name: Limit Code (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is activated: Place 1 Limit Counter on it for each Cyberse Link Monster in your GY, then Special Summon 1 "Code Talker" monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, equip this card to it. Once per turn, during your End Phase, remove 1 Limit Counter from this card. When the last Limit Counter is removed from this card, destroy the equipped monster. When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster. While this card is on your field or in your GY, "Limit Code" cannot be activated.

texts.name: Boot Sector Launch (Anime)
texts.desc:
All "Rokket" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Boot Sector Launch" per turn, and only once that turn.
● During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Rokket" monsters with different names from your hand in Defense Position.
● During your Main Phase: You can excavate the top 6 cards of your Deck, send any excavated "Rokket" cards to the Graveyard, also place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
